tab1.text1:
This is a no Wipe Server; If server is to wipe due to unforeseen circumstances, server saves will be uploaded to public drop box
Future maps will be added as they become available.

PvP Server rules:
-No Speedhacking, Purposful Meshing, Aimbotting, Duping.
Cheating will be delt with accordingly and may result in admin wipe and ban.

Generic Server Setting: (full rates listed in 'Server Settings' tab)

-Gernic rates 4x, Player/Wild/Tamed Weight = 5x, Breeding = 4x

-Tek Mini-Teleporters & TekBinoculars auto unlock at lv60 (can be used, but still require Replicator to craft)

-Stackable items upto 1000, expect:
   ARB default 100, Shards default 1000, Organic Poly 200 

-Nonstackables items upto 20, expect:
   Blueprints, Fertilizer

-All Admin Commands are displayed in global chat for transparency

-Links Below:
   'Indecisive Discord' = Discord invite
   'Taming Tool' = dododex
   'Breeding Tool' = Crumplecorns breeding web gui

tab2.text1:
-Max Wild Lv 150 (OverrideOfficialDifficulty=5)
-Global Xp = 4x
-Taming = 4x
-Harvesting = 4x
-Global Spoil/Decompostion/Corpse time = 2.5x
-Crop Growth/Decay = 2.5x
-Imprint Ammount = 2.5x
-Baby Growth = 4x
-Baby Cuddle Interval = 0.24 (4.166x)
-Tribe Imprint = On
-Mating Interval = 0.25 (4x)
-Mating Speed = 16x
-Egg Incubation/Gestation = 16x
-Player, wild and tamed weight = 5x
-Tribe Member limit = 6
-Alliance Limit = 2
-Damage Numbers = On
-Item Stat Clamps = On (Offical Vaules)
-Tamed Dino Level Clamp = Off
-Structure Placement Collision = Off
-Permanent Diseases = On
-Under Mesh Checking = Off (do read the PvP rules on welcome screen)
-Dino & Structure Decay = Off (if server becomes laggy or overpopulated will enable with some warning time)
-Leeds & Alpha Leeds = Off (Alpha Tek Cave tributes adjusted to accommodate)
-Multipul Unicorns = On
-Titanosaur Feeding = On
-Titanosaur Food Drain = 0.01 (100x slower)
-Indy Cooker; all dye engrams adjusted to allow autocrafting to function as in ASE
-Auto Unlock Engrams: Tek Binoculars(60),Tek Mini-Teleporters(60)
-Item Stacks = 1000 (with some expections)
   ARB 100, Shards 1000, OrganicPoly 200, Nonstackables 20 (minus Bps & Fertilier)

tab3.text2:
-Baby Growth = 4x
-Food Drain = 1x (default)
-Mating Interval = 0.25 (4x)
-Mating Speed = 16x
-Egg Incubation/Gestation = 16x
-Imprint Ammount = 2.5x
-Baby Cuddle Interval = 0.24 (4.166x)
-Tribe Imprinting = On
